{"id":1814419135,"question_id":3250,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â weeks","timestamp":1761681998,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1852 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1814419135/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Square Area by Removing Fences From a Field","memory":"445.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maximizeSquareArea(int m, int n, vector<int>& hFences, vector<int>& vFences) {\n        const int MOD = 1e9+7;\n        unordered_map<int, bool> hDist, vDist;\n        hFences.push_back(1);\n        hFences.push_back(m);\n        vFences.push_back(1);\n        vFences.push_back(n);\n\n        for (int i=0; i<(int)hFences.size(); i++)\n            for (int j=i+1; j<(int)hFences.size(); j++)\n                hDist[abs(hFences[i] - hFences[j])] = true;\n\n        for (int i=0; i<(int)vFences.size(); i++)\n            for (int j=i+1; j<(int)vFences.size(); j++)\n                vDist[abs(vFences[i] - vFences[j])] = true;\n        \n\n        int maxS = -1;\n        for (auto [k, v] : hDist) {\n            if (vDist.count(k)) \n                maxS = max(maxS, k);\n        }\n        if (maxS == -1)\n            return -1;\n        return (maxS * 1LL * maxS) % MOD;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-square-area-by-removing-fences-from-a-field","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1300}
